s.text: Fodor's solidity and unapologetic stodginess warm my heart, but its Compass American book can't make up in literary savvy what it lacks in maps and practical information.
Most guides contain a list of "recommended" films and books, including travel guides.
Brands like Frommer's and Fodor's, who produce multiple New York titles, invariably recommend several or all of their other guides.
I love that the drive for tourist-free fun is coming full circle, pushing hipsters back on the beaten path.
But the guidebook might be extinct before you have a chance to bring your gifts to the tourist masses.
But the guidebook might be extinct before you have a chance to bring your gifts to the tourist masses.
